text:
aternal obesity, a high-fat diet and excess energy intake during 
pregnancy can adversely affect placental structure and/or function and may permanently alter offspring 
physiology [30] to promote adiposity, adult hyperinsulinaemia, hyperleptinaemia, and increase the risk of T2DM 
and CVD [15,18,23,30,46,47,53]. It is unclear if this increased risk is caused by excessive intake of energy or 
specific macronutrients (fats, protein and/or carbohydrates) [18,23], or possibly combined energy excess,
